sqlMap.insert: insert into dev_form_property( ID, FORM_ID, FIELD_ID, VIEW_NAME, DEFAULT_VALUE, EDIT_TYPE, REQUIRED, IS_VIEW, ORDER_TYPE, WIDTH, ALGIN, IS_SEARCH, SEARCH_TYPE, FILTER_TYPE, FILTER_VALUE, form_order, is_relation, related_code, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values( #id#, #formId#, #fieldId#, #viewName#, #defaultValue#, #editType#, #required#, #isView#, #orderType#, #width#, #algin#, #isSearch#, #searchType#, #filterType#, #filterValue#, #formOrder#, #isRelation#, #relatedCode#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.delete: update dev_form_property set status='0' where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: select id, form_id as formId, field_id as fieldId, view_name as viewName, default_value as defaultValue, edit_type as editType, required, is_view as isView, order_type as orderType, width, algin, is_search as isSearch, search_type as searchType, filter_type as filterType, filter_value as filterValue, form_order as formOrder, is_relation as isRelation, related_code as relatedCode, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from dev_form_property where id=#id#
sqlMap.update:
update dev_form_property
id=#id# form_id=#formId#
field_id=#fieldId#
view_name=#viewName#
default_value=#defaultValue# edit_type=#editType#
required=#required#
is_view=#isView#
order_type=#orderType#
width=#width# algin=#algin# is_search=#isSearch#
search_type=#searchType#
filter_type=#filterType#
filter_value=#filterValue#
form_order=#formOrder#
status=#status#
created=#created#
create_time=#createTime#
updated=#updated#
update_time=#updateTime#
is_relation=#isRelation#
related_code=#relatedCode#
where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: select id, form_id as formId, field_id as fieldId, view_name as viewName, default_value as defaultValue, edit_type as editType, required, is_view as isView, order_type as orderType, width, algin, is_search as isSearch, search_type as searchType, filter_type as filterType, filter_value as filterValue, form_order as formOrder, is_relation as isRelation, related_code as relatedCode, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from dev_form_property where status='1'

select id, form_id as formId, field_id as fieldId, view_name as viewName, default_value as defaultValue, edit_type as editType, required, is_view as isView, order_type as orderType, width, algin, is_search as isSearch, search_type as searchType, filter_type as filterType, filter_value as filterValue, form_order as formOrder, is_relation as isRelation, related_code as relatedCode, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from dev_form_property where status='1'

select df.id as id, form_id as formId, field_id as fieldId, view_name as viewName, df.default_value as defaultValue, edit_type as editType, required, is_view as isView, order_type as orderType, width, algin, is_search as isSearch, search_type as searchType, filter_type as filterType, filter_value as filterValue, form_order as formOrder, df.is_relation as isRelation, df.related_code as relatedCode, df.status as status, df.created as created, df.create_time as createTime, df.updated as updated, df.update_time as updateTime, de.field_type as fieldType, de.field_code as fieldCode from dev_form_property df, dev_entity_field de where df.status='1' and de.status='1' and df.field_id = de.id
select count(*) from dev_form_property where status='1'
sqlMap.update: update dev_form_property set status = '0' where form_id not in (select id from dev_form where status='1')
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from dev_form_property df, dev_entity_field de where df.status='1' and de.status='1' and df.field_id = de.id

select f.id as formPropertyId, f.form_id as formId, f.field_id as fieldId, f.view_name as viewName, f.default_value as defaultValue, f.edit_type as editType, f.required as required, f.is_view as isView, f.order_type as orderType, f.width as width, f.algin as algin, f.is_search as isSearch, f.search_type as searchType, f.filter_type as filterType, f.filter_value as filterValue, f.form_order as formOrder, f.is_relation as isRelation, f.related_code as relatedCode, e.entity_id as entityId, e.field_code as fieldCode, e.field_name as fieldName, e.entity_order as entityOrder, e.field_type as fieldType, e.field_length as fieldLength, e.is_pk as isPk, e.is_null as isNull, e.data_type_id as dataTypeId, e.control_type as controlType, d.entity_code as entityCode from dev_form_property f, dev_entity_field e, dev_entity d where f.form_id = #formId# and f.field_id=e.id and d.id=e.entity_id
